name: Takeoff from Cork (Aer Lingus Regional ATR72-500) *With ATC*
description:
Takeoff from Cork (ORK) runway 17 onboard Aer Lingus ATR72-500 EI-REL, operating flight EI3706 to Birmingham (BHX) on Tuesday 25 March 2014.  Flight operated by Aer Arann.

Full flight:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kGJyC6ljIz0

Video taken from seat 4A.

Flight details:  http://aviationphotos.co.uk/flights/flight_details.php?fid=256

✈ ✈
Equipment used:

Camera: GoPro Hero4 Silver http://goo.gl/Wz7Uxt
Mount: Generic suction mount http://goo.gl/E2vRBs
Swivel Mount: http://goo.gl/vWQVne
Boya Frame Case for GoPro: http://goo.gl/tqM3H1
Battery: Anker E7 25600mAh  http://goo.gl/ZXfxOy
MicroSD cards: Sandisk 128GB http://goo.gl/KDjm4Y

✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈
